project.name: testxsl
project.description:
build.xml:$Revision$ Ant 1.4.1+ build script for compiling and running Xalan-J tests.
Note that this is a slightly unusual Ant build.xml file, since we support both compiling/packaging the Xalan-J tests themselves, as well as a number of targets designed to execute the tests once they're built.
In general the compilation targets (i.e. ones that compile the test classes themselves) do list their dependencies explicitly. Targets that serve to execute tests do not normally list any dependencies - users must manually 'build jar' first.
@author shane_curcuru@lotus.com @see build.bat
This file has been written, to enable running XalanJ tests from XalanJ source distribution. This file is largely, a copy of the file build.xml provided by XalanJ xalan-test git repos.
